snippet: The cupcake shop operator, which was delisted from the Nasdaq, said it was shuttering all its stores.
abstract: Cupcake shop operator Crumbs, which was delisted from the Nasdaq, says it is shuttering all its stores.
lead_paragraph: The cupcake shop operator, which was delisted from the Nasdaq, said it was shuttering all its stores.

headline.main: Crumbs Abruptly Closes All of Its Cupcake Shops
headline.print_headline: Crumbs Abruptly Closes All of Its Cupcake Shops
